name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in delivering high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React**, focusing on optimizing web performance and creating intuitive user interfaces. Experienced in system architecture and database design, ensuring robust and scalable solutions. Adept at frontend coding practices and leveraging Agile methodologies for efficient project execution. 

Additionally, skilled in **Flutter** for mobile applications, and possess a strong foundation in backend technologies including **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven ability to integrate AI/ML capabilities for enhanced functionalities while deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**. Committed to compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, and experienced in mentoring junior developers to foster a collaborative team environment.
